snippet: Brad Gilbert released “Winning Ugly” 20 years ago, during his twilight years on the tour. Using his own career as an example, the book attempts to unlock the secrets to being a better competitor.
abstract: Brad Gilbert released “Winning Ugly” 20 years ago, during his twilight years on the tour. Using his own career as an example, the book attempts to unlock the secrets to being a better competitor.

headline.main: Gilbert Is Still Teaching How to Win Ugly
